meanings.sent1: The sunflowers looked radiant in the morning light.
meanings.sent2: She had a radiant smile that lit up the room.
meanings.sent3: The radiant stars twinkled in the night sky like tiny diamonds.
meanings.sent4: Her radiant personality shone through in everything she did.
meanings.sent5: The radiant sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: A unit of plane angle, equal to the angle subtended at the center of a circle by an arc equal in length to the radius
meanings.sent1: The compass needle pointed towards the north with radiants marked on it.
meanings.sent2: He measured the angle in radiants to calculate the area of the sector.
meanings.sent3: The pizza was cut into eight equal slices, each subtending a radiant angle.
meanings.sent4: The radiants of the circle helped determine the direction of the wind.
meanings.sent5: The radiant angle of the clock's hands showed it was time for lunch.
